All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AmbientLight
class that defines the Ambient Light
BeamTest
 
Camera
The Camera class
Color
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Coordinate
Class Coordinate is the basic class representing a coordinate for Cartesian coordinate system.
Cylinder
Cylinder is a finite Tube with a certain height
DirectionalLight
the directional light class that holds a directional vector
FlatGeometry
Flat Geometry is a Marker abstract class extending Geometry to differentiate it from RadialGeometry we did not declare it as an interface
Geometries
a class that implements Intersactable
Geometry
interface Geometry is the basic interface for all geometric objects who are implementing getNormal method.
ImageWriter
Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
Intersectable
Intersectable is a common interface for all geometries that are able to intersect from a ray to their entity (Shape)
Intersectable.GeoPoint
GeoPoint is just a tuple holding references to a specific point ain a specific geometry
Light
The light abstract class
LightSource
Interface for common actions of light sources
LightsTests
Test rendering a basic image
Main
 
Material
Material is a class that define the material of each object
Pixel
Represents an adaptive-sampled pixel on the view plane - may be divided to sub pixels
PixelRay
Represents a ray in adaptive-sampled pixel with the ray color
Plane
The plane class
Point3D
Point3D basic point with coordinates in X, Y, Z axes
PointLight
The PointLight object specifies an attenuated light source at a fixed point in space that radiates light equally in all directions away from the light source.
Polygon
Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
RadialGeometry
RadialGeometry is an abstract class that defines all radial geometries.
Ray
This class contains a 3dPoint and a vector
ReflectionRefractionTests
Tests for reflection and transparency functionality, test for partial shadows (with transparency)
Render
This class render the scene
RenderTests
Test rendering abasic image
Scene
The class that build the scene
Scene.SceneBuilder
the scene Bilder Class
ShadowTests
 
Sphere
The Sphere class
SpotLight
The SpotLight object specifies an attenuated light source at a fixed point in space that radiates light in a specified direction from the light source.
Triangle
The triangle class
Tube
Represents an infinite tube in the 3D space.
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g.
Vector
